### isLargeStride() {#afd93a890632771073642d06a10ce7b89}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AMDGPUPerfHintAnalysis.cpp&#125;::AMDGPUPerfHint::isLargeStride (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst)</>}>
Check if the instruction is large stride.

The purpose is to identify memory access pattern like: x = a&#91;i&#93;; y = a&#91;i+1000&#93;; z = a&#91;i+2000&#93;; In the above example, the second and third memory access will be marked large stride memory access.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuperfhintanalysis-cpp/#l00112">112</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuperfhintanalysis-cpp">AMDGPUPerfHintAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
